label: replicaCount
description: vanguard deployment replicas and default is 1

label: imageRepository
description: vanguard deployment image repository and default is zdnscloud/vanguard

label: imageTag
description: vanguard deployment image tag and default is v0.2

label: generalLogEnabled
description: vanguard general log enable and default is false

label: cacheEnabled
description: vanguard general cache enable and default is true
